Reviews.Title: A delightful surprise.
Reviews.Author: MobileJunky
Reviews.Content: I must say, Huawei has stepped up thier game with this one. After all the buzz at CES 2012 I really wanted to get my hands on this device, however it wasn't available in the US until now. I used the Samsung Galaxy S II as my daily driver until stepping into the P1. the first thing i noticed was the size. it fits well in my hand and against my face while talking, not awkward and bulky like the S2. it's fast under the hood, and comes with Android ICS vanilla--so i don't have the bloatware from my carrier, and i can customize it how i like. the DLNA works awesome with my Playstation 3, and the graphics are crisp and clean. Best thing about it: Penta Band HSPA+!! I switched from ATT to Tmobile, and I can use the P1 on both! now I am out of contract using the phone i want. I'm pleasantly surprised...i will be keeping this one for a while.

Reviews.Title: Huawei U9200 Ascend P1, Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: Larry Nolan "GRUMPY G"
Reviews.Content: I have had this Huawei U9200 Ascend P1 Unlocked Smart Phone for only 5 days, but my first few days of experience with it are great. I use Consumer Cellular for my mobile phone service. I was able to save all my phone contacts to the sim-card in my older smart phone, remove the sim-card and the mini SDHD memory card and install them in my new smart phone and was instantly reconnected to Consumer Cellular and able to make calls and use the music player and other features.  A feature that really impressed me, is that you don't have to open the phone up to install the sim-card and the mini SDHD memory card. There is a covered slot at the top where the sim-card is installed and a covered slot on the right side for the mini SDHD card. After installation, both slots are again covered and the cards securely protected. This was so easy to do and very user friendly. This phone is quite fast, comes with many apps, is slim, light weight and feels and looks great and the price was right. I am an Amazon Prime member and have access to all of my music and apps on their cloud server for this Huawei smart phone as well as my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32GB tablet. I save enough on my mobile phone and data service thru Consumer Cellular that it was more cost effective for me to purchase this unlocked phone thru Amazon instead of Consumer Cellular or one of the other major providers. So far I love this smart phone and its many features and will update this review if anything changes.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device!
Reviews.Author: PhoneNerd
Reviews.Content: I am so excited to see Amazon finally offering a US, fully warrantied, version of the Huawei Ascend P1.  I have been waiting for months to see this finally come to the states.  In my travels, I was able to demo this device and it's amazing how light, slim, and fast the device is.  I wish Huawei would launch more high-end devices with the major carriers, but I am thrilled to have the option to purchase this unlocked and through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Huawei Ascend P1....will NOT disappoint !!!
Reviews.Author: Power User
Reviews.Content: The Huawei Ascend P1 is simply the best smart phone I have ever used. I am a heavy user focusing primarily on streaming audio & video, social media, navagation and web browsing.You can read the specs, they speak for themselves: [...]At a high level, the smartphone is thin and very light. The large screen is full HD with stunning pics and video containing an 8 meg camera. It is fast moving with the dual core 1.5 GHz processor, multi tasking with ease. I am impressed now that Amazon is finally selling an un-locked version of this device so you can activate it on your particular GSM carrier and have a full warranty for peace of mind.Get after it!

Reviews.Title: State of art
Reviews.Author: F. VILELA
Reviews.Content: It took me a long time to choose this phone over Sony Xperia P, Samsung SIII Mini and Nokia Lumia 820. For the price paid I consider this the best choice by far. At first I had a hard time trying to get my contacts from Nokia 701 and in the end after installing Huawei's software I could do it like a breeze!Pros: Excellent grip, beautiful handset, so thin and lightweight, marvelous screen with vivid colours, Android with a nice manufacturer touch, awesome 3d effects, fast, good audio quality.Cons: No physical shutter buttonIn my opinion, in this price range this phone is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Thin, very light, fast, and very beautiful.
Reviews.Author: amazon360
Reviews.Content: After 2 weeks of use, I are completely satisfied with the Ascend P1. CPU can reach 1.5 GHz after turn off the power saving mold. Search the webs I have not found any major hardware problems about this phone. Yet battery lasts 2-3 days if you are not a heavy user. Well worth the money if you do not want to spend a lot more for a newer or high end products.Also the seller is very responsible.Looking forward the P6 to be sold in the US.

Reviews.Title: Super light and thin...... fast, too,  with a good battery life
Reviews.Author: RH
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for a while to have a practical mid-range smart phone that does its job but without a bulky body so that I can put it easily into my pocket.I see a lot of my friends put their smart phones on their desk whenever I see them, probably due to their bulky sizes or poor battery life (Constant charging, and charging........).But with Huawei P1, I can barely feel it in my pocket and the battery life is very good. I am a very light user and it can easily last 2-3 days with one full charge. Ever since I own this phone two months ago, I have never charged it in work place or any other places, only at home. I never worry it will run out of juice when it is not supposed to.What is more, it is fast too and ever since I own it, it has not crashed once .While the screen is bright with vivid colors, I do wish it came with a higher resolution. Other than that, it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective smartphone
Reviews.Author: Endlsee is great
Reviews.Content: Great phone for what I have paid ($254.27)If You are OK with this screen size 4.3" - Than no need to pay more.This smartphone will do what the more expensive smartphone does.Not sure If I would have buy for $325.00 ...At those price levels you can consider Nexus 4 Which have bigger screen.You can not change battery in this phone unless technician open it !It comes will almost all languages of the world, But no Hebrew.The ON/Off Button in the right is bit hard to push and made of Plastic - Galaxy metal (?) Buttons are much easier ...Read here about battery life[...]Very good smartphone !!!!

Reviews.Title: best bang for buck phone
Reviews.Author: Oscar A. Campos Escobar
Reviews.Content: is wayyyyy more faster than the s3 mini.. very stylish black on black for a true MAN.the only downside? u cant use bitorrent to download large files like ISO's, games or 1080p movies this device comes with one SD "emulated" i been try many ways to put my files on my mnt/ext_sdcard/download but the torrent clien always say error, the only way is donwload to the phone and "copy" to ur sd. the internal storage is barely small (2gbs) keep on mind that.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: I have been using this phone for a week and I think is a great phone.Pros:Very fast (is a dual core with 1 GB RAM).The display is very clear.Light and tiny.Camera is good.It has Dolby sound, nice to hear music with headphonesIt has SD card slot.It has a good design, it looks very professional and serious.Cons:It has Android 4.0.3 (Huawei just announced a 4.2.2 upgrade, we are waiting for...)The email app has a bug. Sometimes it says that the password is bad, sometimes it downloads my messages.You can't change the battery by yourself.The software only shows 660 Mb of RAM.The phone is unlocked, I'm using it in Colombia with Tigo and Virgin without problems.This phone is very good for its price. I think is a very good option if you compare with Samsung Galaxy II, III mini and maybe III. For U$250 it's a bargain.Upgrade 9 Jul 20133 days ago I upgraded the phone to Android 4.1.1 (Huawei oficial beta version available in [...] and the email bug was resolved. Now the software shows 710 Mb of RAM. The camera app is better and everything has worked OK.

Reviews.Title: Hueawei u9200
Reviews.Author: Fabian
Reviews.Content: because it is a great phone, and it is beatifull its size, The Huawei Ascend P1 is simply the best smart phone I have ever used

Reviews.Title: pretty awsome phone
Reviews.Author: thrain
Reviews.Content: Looking for a unlocked phone for a while, this one is not a famous brand, but i really like it now. It's very fast, so thin and light, pretty long battery life, and works well for all the work I do every day, such as gaming, youtube, navigation, emails. And the phone voice quality is also very good.Maybe the drawback is the screen is 4.3 instead of 4.7 on Samsung S3, but for me, it's good enough.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Rocks.......Most Awesome Smart Phone!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Harrison from LA
Reviews.Content: Huawei Rocks!!!!!I have been waiting forever to get this little beauty.  This is the best smart phone in the USA.  Maybe best in the world.  I can't wait to get mine as I have been searching for this one as it is as fast as a PC with a perfect form factor.  Great job Amazon and I will really enjoy this great new product.  I saw it this summer in Chicago at a show and just love it.  Better than Iphone, Samsung or Nokia.Harrison

Reviews.Title: A very good phone
Reviews.Author: Li Zhan
Reviews.Content: This my first smartphone, and I find it is very easy to use, fast in response, extremely light. I like it very much, and I found that I spend too much time on the phone. The only drawback is its battery life - It can only last one day after intensive use, but the time of recharge is short and I think this is the common problem for all smart phones

Reviews.Title: A Serious Contender!
Reviews.Author: Leighton Tugwell
Reviews.Content: Huawei U9200 Ascend P1 is a respectable piece of equipment. Bought this phone for a friend who respects my advice and wanted some assistance buying a phone (too lazy to research) I did and am really glad. They have positioned themselves to be a real force to contend with in the very near future.No Complaints for the money. I own an SII and an HTC EVO. I would buy this phone for myself and save alot of money.Easy to use.Up and running in seconds. Pop in your GSM chip, log in to sync your email and Go! It really should always be so simple.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: wle "wle"
Reviews.Content: i like itothers have said what they likei like itbut anything this  complex has some odd things about itcamera has no dedicated shutter buttoni can;t seem to get android voice input to work [without google voice recognition]battery not user replaceable [but i knew that]no real keyboard [also i knew that and it can;t have one and be so thin]not sure the camera is very goodso far just blurry pictures is all i get in ordinary room lightring tones are not very loud even on maxvibrate is  not  very strongnot  sure there is a reminder for voice mail and missed calls other than one timenot sure there is a 'download voice mail to the phone so i don;t have to call to get it' appwle

Reviews.Title: It is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Lenny Pop
Reviews.Content: The phone is extremely slim, and it's beautiful. Performance is great, it's smooth and responsive. I highly recommend this phone for those doesn't want to spend a fortune on a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great SmartPhone
Reviews.Author: Nena
Reviews.Content: I love my phone, is excellent. Covers all my expectations, it is fast, very light, very thin and the screen size is perfect. He had already had experience with Huawei products, really do not disappoint. The battery lasts me pretty much all day.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: LUIS ROBERTO
Reviews.Content: were very good my products, this again could buy more, provided the committee recommends .. the quality is awesome .. thank you very much

Reviews.Title: It's a good cellphone
Reviews.Author: Alvaro
Reviews.Content: It's a good cellphone, It's one of the best phone I have had until now, don't miss this phone. ok

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: darkcisnelle "a galvan"
Reviews.Content: Using this on Tmobile network, is very fast , I no longer envy other ppl smartphone . no contract all mine and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Smartphone for a 'Steal.'
Reviews.Author: Victor Osa Asemota
Reviews.Content: I was looking to buy a Samsung Galaxy 3 for my wife, but she opted for this product.  I ordered it with reservation.  When it arrived, it was a pleasant surprise: at a fraction of the price you would pay for the frontline names.  It is fast, sturdy and slick.  In other words: Samsung Galazy was put together and was given the name tag HUAWEI.  The only thing they should work on would be the quality of the front camera.  Who needs that so badly anyway?

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Y. Chen "cincyxman"
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Very light and easy to use. It is much better then my previous phone Samsung Galaxy S3 that has very short better life. The better life is much better on Ascend P1 that can last 3 days if I don't use my GPS or use it as WiFi Tether hotspot.

Reviews.Title: great value!!
Reviews.Author: kaminari
Reviews.Content: It a great phone, sad it only has 4.0.3 at the time being, but taking that away i think there is no better value phone on the market

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Yamaly Alvarez
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone, with fast system, ultra light model, easy to carry  anywhere, excelent photos (brights, clears and fast taking)

Reviews.Title: Great smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Marquez
Reviews.Content: I just love it. It is fast, it has a beautiful design, and the most important thing: I'm really happy with it. The best purchase I have made in a long time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Herazo
Reviews.Content: I received the product. I'm happy with the product. The phone got in excellent condition and all packed. The phone works great. Thank you very much, I will buy again!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone, HUAWEI Rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: Yosneida
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, since it showed at CES 2012 what I wanted and waiting for the opportunity to acquire it, super fast, super thin, and very manageable, great sound, and images ,id go snooping to take full advantage,I'm happy with my new phone has nothing to envy to other brands, but it is a phone that has a lot of versatility...!

Reviews.Title: Almost excellent
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in Dominican Republic for $170 with contract and must say that the phone is excellent in almost all aspects, good speed, excellent screen with the right size, very fast HSPA network at least in my country. Where the phone one goes down is in the reproduction of sound, sounds good but low when using headphones. If you use in-ears headphones there are no problem but the things change with high impedance headphones so I recommend an amplifier, or better as I did; an USB OTG Adapter + some small usb sound card and you have excellent audio output.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I have got this for two weeks. Very good handset. Better than expected. The size just fit my hand, very comfortable. Price beat all other competitor including google nexus. My friend has a nexus. It just got locked when he tried to answer incoming call sometimes. It happens at least twice every week. He had to restart it. It is very annoying. But it never happens to Ascend P1 so far.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE PHONE
Reviews.Author: Oriana Blanco
Reviews.Content: wow is a very light phone, the camera takes great photos, the black color gives elegance. 100% recommend the seller even though the cell comes from Singapure and had to wait longer than stipulated, arrived here in Venezuela in good condition. Completely satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: URGENT
Reviews.Author: alix mata pino
Reviews.Content: Product characteristics HUAVEI U9200 ASCEND P1 UNIOCKED PHONE - BLACK, ME LIBERTY EXPRESS MIAMI infomed THAT WAS ON EMPTY, BUT I AM GOING TO THE DEALER, AND THERE APPEARS THAT IF RECEIVED A. OBRIEN ETE AS IS LORD RECEIVES THE LADY BETSY CURBELO LIBERTY EXPRESS MESSAGE SEND ME THAT WAS ON eMPTY PLEASE INVESTIGATE THIS THANK YOU FOR THE PRODUCT COMES TO YOUR DESTINATION AND SO YOU CAN FOLLOW YOU TRUSTING. ALIX MATA.

Reviews.Title: I haven`t it yet.
Reviews.Author: Yaniret Garcia
Reviews.Content: I liked its size and specially all things it have. But, I don`t have my phone yet. Because, it hasn`t gotten it yet to Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Horrible battery
Reviews.Author: stanimir tsonchev
Reviews.Content: Phone came with totally exhausted battery, I charge the phone 100% , go to sleep and in the morning battery is 60% full only, may be phone should be charged once a while when not used for a year, amazon haven't done it, and that might have tainted the battery. Other than that, phone is OK.

Reviews.Title: Not exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Order came promptly, but can't find this model at Huawei's website.  Don't know if Warranty will be covered by Huawei at all.  The phone described as having 1GB of RAM, but only find it to have 660MB of RAM.  Not as fast as it should compare to similar phones.  Camera quality appears to be great though.  The body also has a good feel with its thinness.  Can easily hold it in one hand.  Is there any way to check its processor and speed?Update:  Now after a couple of months of using the P1PROS:Again, very good camera comparatively speakingNice feel and appearanceFairly fast for basic web browsingMicroSD card slot:  Apps can be downloaded to SD card when selected as defaultGood sound if you have good headphonesGood screen resolutionCONS:Again, Quick System Info shows total memory: 659MB, Processor:: Dual-Core 0:700Mhz and 1:700Mhz (NOT the advertised 1GM of RAM)Short battery-must charge everyday if you use like an hour with the web or any data consumptionNo removable batteryVery low speaking/soundCrashes all the time, is it because of Android 4.0 or low memory?Not as well build as it appears.  After a couple of months use now can feel the flimsiness of the bodyUunsure if it'll ever be upgradable-trying at this time.Screen is not as sensitive as it should: it's either not responding or jumpsMedia files load very slowIf you can get it for $200, it's probably still worth it.  Don't pay for a higher price when there're many phones in this price range and especially the Nexus 4 is now only $200.  If I waited I would've definitely gotten the Nexus 4.

Reviews.Title: buy this phone
Reviews.Author: russell perez
Reviews.Content: sweet phone.i recommend it.unlocked to meet all requirements.better than expected.thin and light.cool cool cool.rad rad rad.cant beat it with a stick

Reviews.Title: a nice phone
Reviews.Author: saidoem
Reviews.Content: very nice . this phone is much better than Sanmung Galaxy S2..... faster than htc one s ...more in ues....

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!
Reviews.Author: f355911tt
Reviews.Content: First let me say this review is for Huawei customer service, not the phone.These people are the absolute worst in customer service that I have ever dealt with, their North American support team. I called 3 different times and spoke with 3 different people, the first two tech support reps told me they do not support the Huawei p1 in North America and told me to call their global support team. They did not even know what it was, their own product, the P1, they were clueless as to its very existence. When you do go to the global support website under English, guess what phone number is listed, the very same number I called in the North American territory(888.548.2934). Please feel free to call it and see how horrible these people are regarding assistance of any kind. Maybe if enough people call and complain, they will change their ways. The first woman I spoke with her name is Kimberly, she did everything she could do to not answer any questions and kept pawning me off to the global support team. The very phone I am looking at on their website and she is telling me she doesn't have any information on it. She did anything she could possibly do to not help me, including being rude. The next guy I talked to his name was Adam, he was also a complete a-- and would not help me stating the same thing, that the P1 U9202 or U9200 is not supported. I ended up hanging up on him because he was being such an a-- not wanting to help. So I call back a third time,  I get a female who is very friendly this time and acted like she did want to help me. I thought finally, she then contradicts both associates stating that the P1 is supported. Then I ask her my question and what did she tell me, LOL!!! I have to call the carrier, I told her there are not any US carriers that sell that phone, that it is an unlocked gsm unit, telling her that it's listed on Amazon and eBay and a few other websites. Get this , she tells me to call Amazon!! Are you kidding me, as great as Amazon is at customer service, the best in the business, obviously Amazon is not responsible.These people at Huawei support are incompetent employees that they put in front of a computer with a checklist of generic answers to deter and defer to anybody but the very equip. Mfc. that make the phone.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Chines Junk
Reviews.Author: redicon
Reviews.Content: This phone is a cheap plastic imitation of a smart phone. It has some cute features like the slim size but the camera does not like low lite, the wireless is lousy, the menus jump around when the phone is reoriented like it is too sensitive to movement, can't turn haptic feedback off and their customer service will not honor their warranty. Try calling 1-888-5 huawei yourself and ask for support - they will send you away promptly and rudely. Get a name brand like the google Nexus 4 8g for half the price and guranteed support and updates.

Reviews.Title: no reason to buy this
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: I must say i don't actually have the phone, but i dont see any reason why someone would choose this over a more up to date android phone, specifically the nexus 4. Like this phone, the nexus 4 is unlocked, off contract and works on both T-Mobile and AT&T.; The Nexus 4 has a more up to date version of android, android 4.2 Jellybean versus version 4.0 ICS on this phone. for those that think this doesn't matter, Jellybean brings HUGE speed and fluidity improvements. The Nexus 4 is also a Google phone, meaning it will get future updates as soon as they are released, unlike this phone. The hardware on the nexus 4 is also much better than on the Ascend p1. The nexus 4 has a quad core snapdragon s4 pro processor, adreno 320 GPU, and 4.7 inch 720p HD screen versus the much slower dual core TI OMAP4 processor and less sharp 4.3 quarter-HD screen on the P1. for those that think the 4.7 inch screen is too big of a phone, its not, its similar in overall size to this phone, although this phone is just a hair thinner. I know from experience in using both of these devices that the nexus 4 is just an overall  faster, MUCH smoother, and better experience. and its backed by Google so issues will be fixed very quicklyand the biggest reason: THE NEXUS 4 IS $150 CHEAPER THAN THIS PHONE WHILE STILL BEING UNLOCKED AND OFF CONTRACT. you may have to wait a few extra weeks as they are currently sold out on the google play store, but it is well worth it. you are getting a much better, newer phone for less.

ProductInfo.Name: Huawei U9200 Ascend P1 Unlocked Phone - Black
